lenya:publication.lenya:name: Lenya's Weblog
lenya:publication.lenya:description:
This publication is an initiative to implement the "Echo" specification for syndicating, archiving and editing episodic web sites (e.g. weblogs).
Customizing the layout The fonts and colors can be customized by editing the file resources/css/styles.css. The positioning can be customized by editing the file xslt/global.xsl. The following CSS resources might be helpful

The Beauty of CSS Design
